sources.title: 07SpooksRunWild
sources.description: Spooks Run Wild  is an American  comedy horror  film and the seventh film in the  East Side Kids  series, starring  Bela Lugosi ,  Leo Gorcey ,  Huntz Hall , and  Bobby Jordan . Released in 1941, it was directed by  Phil Rosen , in his first and only outing in the series, and produced by  Sam Katzman  (under the company name  Banner Pictures ). It is based on an original script by  Carl Foreman  and  Charles R. Marion . Directed by Phil Rosen Produced by Sam Katzman Written by Carl Foreman Charles R. Marion Starring Bela Lugosi Leo Gorcey Huntz Hall Music by Johnny Lange Lew Porter Cinematography Marcel Le Picard Edited by Robert Golden Distributed by Monogram Pictures Corporation Release dates October 24, 1941 Running time 65 minutes
